resources.string: The position of a student or trainee who works in an organization or in a company in order to gain knowledge and work experience.
Paid internships are the training for the students,recent graduates and others looking for the job experience that contains financial compensation
Unpaid internships are also for students,graduates and others looking for job experience but it doesnt contains a financial compensation
For a students and others who were looking for resources to learn the technical courses we will provide a different resources to learn the courses which are free and paid too

EDX 
 Udemy 
 Unacademy 
 Coursera 
 GreatLearning 
 SimplyLearn 
 KhanAcademy 
 ProgrammingHub 
 SoloLearn

It is a coding event that brings interested people together to improve or to build a new software in a hackathon not only programmers are essential to complete a project it is composed of different roles to get a job done and it contains a time limit like 24hours,1day,2days based on the company or an event
Every hackathon has a page on facebook by liking a one page will give you a 5 to 7 hackathon news in your feed and in instagram,twitter too
It is used to communicate with the computer with a set of instructions by using languages like c,java,python we can create a software that solves the real world problems
It contains FrontEnd and BackEnd \n FrontEnd: UI (UserInterface) part \n BackEnd: Functioning part

Chatgpt,GoogleBard 
 For Searching web: MicrosoftBing,
 Perplexity, Youchat 
 To generate images: MidJourneyAi 
 For fun: CharacterAi 
 For writing: WriteSonicAi 
 For Copy: CopyAi 
 For Ai art and writing: JasperAi
